Setting.name: Return/Exchange Reason
Setting.Description: List of possible return/exchange reasons on POS.
Setting.Default: Mistaken Purchase Defective Product Wrong Product For Fun (Change of Mind)

Setting.name: Tax Rate
Setting.Description: Current Tax Rate - Please contact support if you wish to update. Any change here should be made after end of day and will be applicable for accounts open from the next day.

Setting.name: Stock Tax Type
Setting.Description: Stock includes tax or not.(I or E).

Setting.name: Warranty Cancel Days
Setting.Description: This is the period of time in days from delivery that a warranty can be cancelled in isolation to a product.

Setting.name: Number of Warranty Contract HO copies
Setting.Description: Number of head office copies of the warranty contract.

Setting.name: Number of Warranty Contract Credit copies
Setting.Description: Number of credit copies of the warranty contract.

Setting.name: Number of Warranty Contract copies
Setting.Description: Number of copies of the warranty.

Setting.name: Curreny Symbol for print
Setting.Description: The currency symbol that will be printed on Agreement and Invoice documents.

Setting.name: Decimal Places for .Net
Setting.Description: Indicates the number of decimal places to be used in .NET. If Prefixed by a 'C' then the currency symbol for the country will also show. If prefixed by an 'F' then the currency symbol for the country will not be displayed. If prefixed by an 'N' then the currency symbol for the country will not be displayed and, thousand separators are inserted between each group of three digits. Example: In Jamaica C2 would result in J$5000.45, F2 would result in 5000.45, N2 would result in 5,000.45.

Setting.name: Is Duty Free Sale Allowed
Setting.Description: Determines whether the country can perform duty free sales or not

Setting.name: Min Free Months on Replacements (%)
Setting.Description: The minimum number of months (as a percentage of the original item?s free/manufacturer warranty length) that a replacement item on an IR replacement can receive

Setting.name: Delay New IRW (True / False)
Setting.Description: If True, when an IRW replacement item receives complimentary free/manufacturer warranty months, then the start date of any purchased IRW on the replacement item is delayed until the end of the free months

Setting.name: Tax Name
Setting.Description: Indicates type of tax i.e. VAT or GST.

Setting.name: Thermal Printer Name
Setting.Description: The Name of the thermal printer for direct receipt printing.
